body.bibl: Teule, Herman G. B. “Ignatius Anṭūn Samḥīrī, a 19th Century Syrian-Catholic Patriarch, and His Journey to the Low Countries.” In Graeco-Latina et Orientalia: Studia in Honorem Angeli Urbani Heptagenarii, edited by Samir Khalil Samir and Juan Pedro Monferrer-Sala, 371–82. Series Syro-Arabica 2. Cordoba: Cordoba Near Eastern Research Unit / Beirut: Centre de Documentation et de Recherches Arabes Chrétiennes, 2013.
